member.name: T:ArithmeticOperations.ArithmeticOperationsClass
member.summary: Class for Performing Basic Arithmetic Operations on Two Integers

member.name: M:ArithmeticOperations.ArithmeticOperationsClass.add(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Method to perform addition on Two Integers
member.returns: Integral sum of num1 and num2

member.name: M:ArithmeticOperations.ArithmeticOperationsClass.subtract(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Method to perform subtraction on Two Integers
member.returns: Integral subtraction of num2 from num1

member.name: M:ArithmeticOperations.ArithmeticOperationsClass.multiply(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Method to perform multiplication on Two Integers
member.returns: Integral product of num1 and num2

member.name: M:ArithmeticOperations.ArithmeticOperationsClass.divide(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Method to perform division on Two Integers
member.returns: Integral division quotient of num1 divided by num2

member.name: M:ArithmeticOperations.ArithmeticOperationsClass.modular(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Method to perform modular division on Two Integers
member.returns: Integral division remainder of num1 divided by num2
